title: Sona gets the Ultimate Skin
body:
Though I am happy its her and that it is a support, I am sad that in order to do this **THEY NERFED THE LIFE OUT OF HER**.

So, I'm thinking of playing as Sona now. 

Anyone else happy she gets the ultimate skin?

**Edit**

http://www.surrenderat20.net/2015/01/dj-sona-promo.html#more

http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-g3rLbIqwVy8/VMvbWPMobnI/AAAAAAAAjGQ/2-pbhjYDMCU/s1600/asdasdasd.jpg

Forgot the proof. She will be called DJ Sona.

replies.body: The teasers are sickk. Glad if she's getting it. Skin will be amazing.

Some reason they are giving another skin that will look like arcade sona?

ugh, riot...come on....
DJ and Arcade are two way different concepts.  DJ is Music based where as Arcade is Video Game.
I know they are different...but I just seeing the "concept" of the two being VERY similar.  just a bad choice to ultimate sona.

I have a feeling she will be getting a slight rework as well.

There is no way Riot is pushing those stat change nerfs out without doing something else.

Wouldn't make sense if they did...

Hopefully we'll get to see the actual skin soon :D  I can't wait to see this.

The music so far though is pretty epic.
it could be a legendary, i doubt it but it could be just a legendary

So upsetting, tbh. She has plenty of skins as it is and she is bad right now and constantly nerfed.. Making an ultimate skin for her was just a total bomb. It probably won't even be better than Arcade Sona which will be the sad part.
Isn't that the same thing that happened with Ezreal? And, Udyr was just a Champion that needed it, but also got some nerfs.
Isn't she getting some buffs on the PBE that hurt her from levels 1~6, but after thatshe becomes significantly stronger?
